import numpy as np
def heuristics_v2(el: tuple[int, ...], n: int, w: int):
    # Penalty for the number of elements in the set
    penalty_1 = len(el) / n
    
    # Penalty for the sum of the elements in the set
    penalty_2 = sum(el) / w
    
    # Penalty for the mean of the elements in the set
    penalty_3 = sum(el) / (len(el) * n)
    
    # Priority schedule
    priority = 1.0 - penalty_1 - penalty_2 - penalty_3
    
    return priority
